paper_abstract: We study the nonlinear phenomena of the coupled semiconductor microcavities driven by coherent lasers in different coupling regimes. It is shown that the bistability and multistability in the strong-coupling regime are gradually generated or eliminated by properly adjusting the coupling strength or the amplitude of the input pump laser. The proposed system serves as a good candidate for the diverse control optical switch and the potential applications.
paper_title: The multistability in the coupled semiconductor microcavities
